text: one of the suspected gunmen died at the
scene the second succumbed to his wounds
earlier this evening at an area Hospital
agents with the DEA and FBI and
conjunction with APD homicide detectives
are working with Mexican law enforcement
in an attempt to identify the deceased
suspects both
I can give you the
highlights your nephews grew impatient
they continued to press me for my
permission to kill Walter White when I
wouldn't give it they settled instead
for de agent
shider but a phone call was placed to
agent shraer moments before the attack
thus giving him the upper
hand Marco was shot in the face and that
instant me Leon
lingered for several
hours the warning called to the DEA
agent Juan Bola may have some insight
into who placed it but yesterday the
federales where it is Henda and into
confusion W shot
dead an accident
perhaps a mistake made by his own
men but we may never
know at any rate I thought you should
hear it from
me this is what comes of Blood for Blood
Hector
